reviewDetails.comment: He was great and and very professional

Dr. Uleis is very thorough and completed Urine & Blood work for me whereas the last doctor only did a Urine test for the same condition. Dr. Uleis made me feel comfortable and at ease knowing the right prescription to help me rid my pain. So far, he’s the best doctor I’ve seen as a walk-in patient.
Very helpful
Doctor Uleis is a very knowledgeable doctor. I feel relaxed when I visit his care office. He's patient and very thorough.
Dr. Uleis is very friendly, thorough and answers all questions. He also walks you through the exam which is a plus. Wait time wasn't too bad and the staff are very friendly.
Dr. Uleis is kind, patient, and a good listener. He’s been my primary care physician for about 15 years, and I keep coming back for annual physicals and check-ups. I highly recommend him!
Dr. Uleis was stubborn and refused to consider any position but his own despite not being able to produce any supporting evidence.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr.Brancato Listen to all my aches and pains was very patient and thorough. She prescribed medication and physical therapy which makes me feel 20 years younger. She is the best Rhumatalogist I’ve been to in years

Dr. Brancato is a wonderful doctor. She’s very smart, knowledgeable about her field and also very personable and empathetic. I like that she works with me in a more holistic way without pushing drugs right away. I’ve been able to make some lifestyle choices/changes that have helped me a lot.  Anytime I send her a question through the patient portal, she responds very quickly.  I would highly recommend Dr. Brancato.
Dr Brancato is attentive and responsive, getting right to the point.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Emy is a very good doctor in terms of correct diagnoses and bedside manners. I had to come back to him after the pandemic even though I have to travel for two hours because he made me feel comfortable and I trust him to help me reach my optimal health.
Very thoughtful and personable.
Dr. Emy is caring and clear. Wonderful doctor.
Dr Emy is a kind, thorough internist who takes the time to discuss his patients’ health and lives in detail.
he is the only doctor i have ever truly and wholeheartedly liked and trusted.

reviewDetails.comment: Dr Pitaro has been my doctor for over 20 years. He is thorough and he is a good listener. Even though I have to travel an hour to see him, I think it is worth it.

Dr Pitaro is the best!  I have been seeing him for over 15 years.  He is very personable and he takes the time to talk to you and to listen to your concerns and questions. He is very thorough and explains everything is simple terms.  I recommend him to all my friends!
I would certainly recommend Dr. Pitaro to anyone.   He has been my PCP for years.
On time. Organized. Address all questions. Quick turnaround of results for physical (2 days). Electronic communication
He is personable, knowledgable, and takes time to speak to patients, and sends clear descriptions of lab results.
Dr. Pitaro is amazing! He is so down to earth and explains everything he is doing. He really cares about his patients, and I am so happy every time I see him! Cannot recommend him enough!!
I have been a patient of Dr Pitaro for more than 20 years and found him always caring and conservative on approach.
